trans-unit.source: Provides an interactive user interface (UI) element that enables users to perform actions on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 提供互動式使用者介面 (UI) 項目，讓使用者在 Web 組件頁面上執行動作。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs are interactive UI elements, typically represented by buttons or hyperlinks, that appear in pages that use Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞命令是互動式 UI 項目，通常由按鈕或超連結，會出現在使用 Web 組件控制項的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Users click verbs to carry out common UI actions for Web Parts controls, such as closing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or closing the edit display mode (a special page view associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control).
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下來執行網頁組件的控制項，例如關閉的通用 UI 動作的動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項或關閉編輯顯示模式 (與相關聯的特殊頁面檢視<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項)。

trans-unit.source: All standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set are associated with either a Web Parts zone (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>) or a Web Parts <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> control (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>).
trans-unit.target: 提供的 Web 組件控制項集合的所有標準動詞命令會與 Web 組件的區域相關聯 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>) 或 Web 組件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控制項 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>)。

trans-unit.source: When the standard verbs are associated with a zone, their actions apply at the zone level, and the verbs usually appear in the zone's header or footer area.
trans-unit.target: 與區域關聯的標準動詞時，其動作會套用在區域層級，動詞命令通常會出現在該區域的頁首或頁尾區域。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common zone-level verbs and describes their actions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出常見的區域層級動詞命令，並說明其動作。

trans-unit.source: Zone-level verb
trans-unit.target: 區域層級動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 動作

trans-unit.source: Close verb
trans-unit.target: 關閉動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: Hides the UI for a zone and typically returns the page to its normal browse mode view.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏的 UI 區域，並將網頁通常傳回其一般瀏覽模式檢視。

trans-unit.source: Apply verb
trans-unit.target: 套用動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Applies changes that a user has made.
trans-unit.target: 適用於使用者所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: OK verb
trans-unit.target: 確定動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Has the combined effect of the apply and close verbs; it applies changes and hides the zone's UI.
trans-unit.target: 已關閉的動詞命令，與套用的聯合的影響它會套用變更，並隱藏區域的 UI。

trans-unit.source: Cancel verb
trans-unit.target: 取消動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any pending changes a user has made.
trans-unit.target: 取消任何暫止使用者所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: Add verb
trans-unit.target: 將指令動詞

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a control that a user has selected from a catalog of controls to a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者從類別目錄的控制項選取指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>區域。

trans-unit.source: Configure verb
trans-unit.target: 設定指令動詞

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: Opens a view to enable users to configure existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檢視，讓使用者能夠設定現有的連接。

trans-unit.source: Disconnect verb
trans-unit.target: 中斷連接的動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Used with zones that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自的區域搭配使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: Terminates an existing connection between two controls.
trans-unit.target: 終止現有的連接兩個控制項之間。

trans-unit.source: As for the standard verbs that are associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> controls, their actions apply to the control itself (or to its child controls).
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的標準動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控制項，其動作會套用到控制項本身 （或其子控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The part control acts as a container for the verb and manages the rendering of the verb.
trans-unit.target: 組件控制項做為指令動詞的容器，並管理指令動詞的轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Most standard verbs associated with part controls appear either directly in the title bar or in a drop-down verbs menu within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的標準組件控制項相關聯的動詞命令會出現，或直接在標題列下拉式動詞命令功能表中的標題列中。

trans-unit.source: Whether these verbs appear directly in the header or in a verbs menu is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property; by default, the verbs appear in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 直接在標頭或動詞命令功能表中，這些動詞命令是否出現取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性; 根據預設，動詞命令會出現在動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists common verbs associated with the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> controls and describes their actions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出各種與相關聯的一般動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控制項並描述其動作。

trans-unit.source: Part control verb
trans-unit.target: 組件控制項的動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 動作

trans-unit.source: Minimize verb
trans-unit.target: 最小化動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在每個伺服器控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: Reduces the control to a minimal representation, hiding everything in its UI except the restore verb.
trans-unit.target: 控制項縮至最小的表示，隱藏其 UI 除了還原動詞命令中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Restore verb
trans-unit.target: 還原動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在每個伺服器控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: Returns a minimized control to its normal size and view.
trans-unit.target: 傳回至其一般大小與檢視的最小化的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Close verb
trans-unit.target: 關閉動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of each server control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在每個伺服器控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: Closes a control and adds it to the page catalog, which means the control is removed from the page but, if there is a properly designed catalog, users can reopen the closed control and return it to the page.
trans-unit.target: 關閉控制項，並將它加入至頁面目錄中，這表示從頁面移除這個控制項，但是，如果沒有適當設計的目錄，使用者可以重新開啟已關閉的控制項，並返回頁面。

trans-unit.source: Connect verb
trans-unit.target: 連接動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, if the page is in connect display mode and if the control can form connections.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域中，若頁面位於連接的顯示模式，如果控制項可以形成連線。

trans-unit.source: Opens a connection UI so that users can create a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: 開啟連接的 UI，讓使用者可以建立控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: Delete verb
trans-unit.target: 刪除動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, if the control was added to the page programmatically (rather than being declared in persistence format).
trans-unit.target: 會出現在控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，如果控制項已加入至網頁以程式設計方式 （而不是所宣告的持續性格式）。

trans-unit.source: Permanently deletes the control instance and any associated personalization data so that, unlike a closed control, the deleted instance can never be restored to the page.
trans-unit.target: 永久刪除控制項執行個體和任何相關聯的個人化資料以便與不同的是關閉的控制項，已刪除的執行個體絕對無法還原至頁面。

trans-unit.source: Edit verb
trans-unit.target: 編輯動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, if the page is designed to permit editing of controls and if the page is in edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，如果頁面設計成允許編輯控制項和若頁面位於編輯顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Selects the control for editing and opens the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: 選取進行編輯的控制項，並開啟 編輯 UI。

trans-unit.source: Export verb
trans-unit.target: 匯出動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, if the control and application are enabled for export.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，如果匯出啟用的控制項和應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Opens a dialog box that enables users to export a description file that contains the serialized state of the control.
trans-unit.target: 開啟對話方塊，讓使用者能夠匯出包含已序列化的控制項狀態的描述檔案。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Help verb
trans-unit.target: 說明動詞命令

trans-unit.source: Appears in the verbs menu of a control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, if the control is designed to provide a Help file.
trans-unit.target: 會出現在控制項中所包含的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，如果控制項用來提供說明檔。

trans-unit.source: Launches a page that provides help for the control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動提供控制項的說明頁面。

trans-unit.source: Along with the standard verbs that are provided with the Web Parts control set, you can also create custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: 以及標準動詞命令所提供的 Web 組件控制項集合，您也可以建立自訂動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: A common scenario for creating custom verbs is to create verbs associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> controls.
trans-unit.target: 建立自訂動詞命令的常見案例是建立相關聯的動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create these verbs, by default they will appear on the verbs menu along with the standard verbs.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立這些動詞命令時，依預設它們會出現在動詞命令功能表以及標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The basic approach for creating such verbs is to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class to create one or more custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: 建立這類動詞命令的基本方法是繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別來建立一或多個自訂動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Then create a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and add the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立繼承自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基底類別，並新增自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection can then be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection of the control, which will cause the custom verbs to appear automatically on the control's verbs menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以再加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>控制項，將導致顯示的自訂動詞命令自動控制項的動詞命令功能表在執行階段集合。

trans-unit.source: As with the standard verbs, you can access the custom verbs programmatically on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用標準動作，例如，您可以存取的自訂動詞命令以程式設計方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts applications can use server controls that do not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, such as custom controls, user controls, or ASP.NET controls.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件的應用程式可以使用伺服器控制項，不會繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，例如自訂控制項，使用者控制項或 ASP.NET 控制項。

trans-unit.source: These server controls, if added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, are dynamically wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, which enables them to function as run-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果加入這些伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，以動態方式各加上方<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件在執行階段，讓他們能夠做為執行時期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a server control that does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, the server control must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface and override its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至不是繼承自伺服器控制項的自訂動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別時，伺服器控制項必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>介面，並覆寫其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a verb, you can create two types of associated event handlers that will run when a user clicks the verb: a server-side event handler (code that runs on the server), and a client-side event handler (code that runs in the client browser).
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的動詞命令時，您可以建立兩種類型的相關聯的事件處理常式會在使用者按一下此動詞命令時執行： 伺服器端事件處理常式 （程式碼在伺服器執行），以及用戶端事件處理常式 （在用戶端瀏覽器中執行的程式碼）。

trans-unit.source: Also, you can define custom states for verbs, which is a useful way to provide visual cues to users.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以定義自訂的狀態為指令動詞，這是有用的方式，來為使用者提供視覺提示。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a state indicating that a verb has been selected, and then provide appropriate changes in the UI to notify the user that the verb is already selected.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您無法建立狀態，表示已選取的指令動詞，，然後再提供適當的變更，在 UI，以通知使用者已選取 指令動詞。

trans-unit.source: Another useful behavior is the ability to disable verbs; by doing this, you can prevent users from clicking verbs if doing so would be harmful or ineffective based on the state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 另一個有用的行為是能夠停用的動詞命令。如此一來，您可以防止使用者按一下動詞命令，如果這樣做，將會損毀或無效狀態為基礎的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class does not expose any unique methods; its exposed methods are all overrides of base methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別不會公開任何唯一的方法; 公開的方法的基底方法的所有覆寫。

trans-unit.source: It does however contain a number of properties for developers to be aware of.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它確實含有許多開發人員要注意的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property indicates whether a verb is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>屬性會指出目前是否選取動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ClientClickHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ServerClickHandler%2A> properties refer to the respective handlers within the class (if any exist) for client and server click events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ClientClickHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ServerClickHandler%2A>屬性是指類別內的個別處理常式 （如果有的話） 的用戶端和伺服器 click 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A> property contains text that describes the purpose of a verb in a ToolTip when users position a mouse pointer over the verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A>屬性包含描述工具提示上的動詞命令的目的，當使用者將滑鼠指標放在 UI 中的動詞命令的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A> property indicates the current status of a verb, which determines whether a user can click the verb and execute its action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A>屬性會指出動詞命令，這會決定使用者是否可以按一下此動詞命令，並執行其動作的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ID%2A> property provides a unique ID for the verb object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ID%2A>屬性為動詞命令的物件提供的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property contains a URL to an image that can be used to represent a verb in the UI in place of the default rendering (typically a button or a hyperlink).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>屬性包含無法用來代表動詞命令 （通常是一個按鈕或超連結） 的預設轉譯取代 UI 中之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A> property contains the label text that appears directly on the verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A>屬性包含直接在 UI 中的動詞命令顯示的標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: The overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A> property determines whether a verb is currently displayed in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A>屬性會決定動詞命令目前是否顯示在 UI 中。

trans-unit.source: Verbs are often hidden or disabled at different times in a Web Parts application; for example, specialty verbs (such as the edit verb and the connect verb) are displayed only when the appropriate controls, settings, and display modes exist on the page to enable those verbs to take meaningful action.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令通常隱藏或停用在不同的時間，在 Web 組件的應用程式。比方說，只在適當的控制項、 設定和顯示模式存在於頁面，讓這些動詞命令才有意義的動作時，會顯示 specialty 動詞命令 （例如編輯動詞命令和連接的動詞命令）。

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令所使用的其他索引鍵成員包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法但不會覆寫自訂動詞命令建立程序處理的事件處理常式，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object, and a custom zone that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add the verb to the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件，並使用自訂區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將指令動詞新增至每個動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域內包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: There are four parts to the code example:
trans-unit.target: 有四個部分的程式碼範例：

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that displays some text.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔，其中包含簡單的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>顯示一些文字控制項。

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object, and a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add the custom verb to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔，其中包含自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件，而簡單的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法，將自訂動詞命令，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains the custom zone and the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂的區域和自訂的網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example contains source code that creates a simple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that displays some text.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分包含建立簡單的原始程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>顯示一些文字控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example contains source code to create the custom zone and the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的第二個部分包含原始程式碼，以建立自訂的區域和自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the zone overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add the custom verb to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，會覆寫區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The verb is added by default to the verbs menu of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令會依預設加入至控制項的動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: Note that, in the code for the custom verb, the constructor for the verb uses a server click handler, and that the method called creates a complete copy of any control that inherits directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, adding the newly created copy to the same zone.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在程式碼的自訂動詞命令指令動詞的建構函式會使用伺服器處理常式，然後，呼叫的方法會建立任何控制項的完整複本，直接繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，將新建立的複本加入至相同的區域。

trans-unit.source: Like the first part of the code example, this source code must be compiled, and in this example the source file was placed in an App_Code subfolder to be dynamically compiled.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分，例如必須編譯這個原始程式碼，並在此範例中，原始程式檔已置於 App_Code 資料夾，來動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the controls.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the page to declare the namespace of the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，沒有`Register`指示詞來宣告命名空間的自訂控制項的頁面頂端附近。

trans-unit.source: No assembly is declared because this example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 沒有組件被宣告，因為這個範例會使用動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: The custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is declared within the custom zone.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在自訂的區域內宣告。

trans-unit.source: You could also declare other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in this zone, and the custom verb would be added to their verbs menus as well.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以宣告其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在這個區域中和自訂動作會加入至其動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下上自訂動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The **Copy Web Part** verb should be visible.
trans-unit.target: **複製 Web 組件**動詞命令應為可見。

trans-unit.source: Click the verb, and note that a copy of the control is added to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 按一下此動詞命令，並注意控制項的複本會新增至區域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class by passing in one of three possible parameters: a reference to a server-side click event handler with an ID string, a reference to a client-side click event handler with an ID string, or references to both types of click event handlers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別藉由傳遞其中一個可能的三個參數： 具有識別碼字串 ID 字串，與用戶端 click 事件處理常式的參考伺服器端 click 事件處理常式的參考或這兩種類型的參考 click 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the unique identifier for a verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，為動詞命令的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that refers to the client-side handler for click events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，參考用戶端按一下事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class and associates a client-side click event handler with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體，並使用戶端按一下事件處理常式與此執行個體產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This class constructor refers to a client-side event handler to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 此類別建構函式是指當使用者按一下使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令時要呼叫的用戶端事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="clientClickHandler" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="clientClickHandler" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the unique identifier for a verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，為動詞命令的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" /> that handles click events on the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" />，處理伺服器上的按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class and associates a server-side click event handler with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體，並使伺服器端按一下事件處理常式與此執行個體產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This class constructor refers to a server-side click event handler to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 此類別建構函式是指當使用者按一下使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令時要呼叫的伺服器端 click 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="serverClickHandler" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serverClickHandler" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the unique identifier for a verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，為動詞命令的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" /> that handles click events on the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" />，處理伺服器上的按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that refers to the client-side handler for click events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，參考用戶端按一下事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class and associates both client and server-side click event handlers with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 類別的新執行個體，並使用戶端和伺服器端按一下事件處理常式與此執行個體產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This class constructor refers to both client-side and server-side click event handlers to call when the user clicks a verb in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 此類別建構函式是指當使用者按一下使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令時要呼叫這兩個用戶端和伺服器端的 click 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="clientClickHandler" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="clientClickHandler" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <paramref name="serverClickHandler" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serverClickHandler" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating that some state associated with a custom verb is currently active or selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示與自訂動詞命令關聯的特定狀態目前正在作用中或已選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a state associated with a custom verb is currently active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果與自訂動詞命令關聯的狀態目前正在作用中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used with any of the standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不使用與任何提供的 Web 組件控制項集合的標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: When it is used with custom verbs, and the property value is set to `true`, a selected check box appears next to the verb to indicate the active status of the verb.
trans-unit.target: 當使用自訂動詞命令，以及屬性值設定為`true`，選取的核取方塊，則表示指令動詞的作用中狀態的動詞命令旁邊會出現。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this property is to give developers a way of indicating that some custom state associated with a verb is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的目的是讓開發人員的指示，某些動詞相關聯的自訂狀態為目前使用中。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a developer creates a custom verb that enlarges the text size (for accessibility purposes) of the body text on all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設 開發人員建立自訂動詞命令放大文字大小 （供協助工具） 的所有本文<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If a user clicks the verb, this property value could be set to `true`, which would cause a selected check box to appear next to the **Increase Text Size** verb in the verbs menu, indicating to users that the state associated with the verb (enlarged text) is active.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值如果使用者按一下此動詞命令，可以設定為`true`，這會導致選取的核取方塊，旁邊出現**放大文字大小**動詞命令在動詞命令功能表中，表示與狀態相關聯的使用者作用中動作 （放大文字）。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string containing the method name of the client-side event handler defined in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 建構函式中所定義之用戶端事件處理常式的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the method that handles client-side click events.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含用來處理用戶端按一下事件的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the name of the method that handles click events for the verb on the client.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取控制代碼，按一下 用戶端上的動詞命令的事件方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a short description of the verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定動詞命令的簡短描述。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a description of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 的描述。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get or set a description of a verb that appears as a ToolTip when a user positions a mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來取得或設定當使用者將滑鼠指標透過動詞命令時，會顯示為工具提示的動詞命令的描述。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A> property in a derived class inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Description%2A>屬性繼承自衍生類別中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>。

trans-unit.source: This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class that overrides the property.
trans-unit.target: 此來源的程式碼將示範只有自訂區域的程式碼部分而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>覆寫屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的程式碼的其餘部分可以找到的範例 > 一節中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a verb is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出指定的動詞命令是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the verb is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此動詞命令已被啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get or set a value indicating whether the verb is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來取得或設定值，指出是否啟用動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: It is useful to be able to enable or disable verbs at given points in the page and control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 最好能夠啟用或停用的動詞命令在網頁和控制項的生命週期的特定點。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a developer wants to prevent users from being able to close the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone for any reason, the developer can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> verb to `false`, and then users will be prevented from closing any controls within that zone.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果開發人員想要防止使用者關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>基於任何理由，開發人員的區域中的控制項可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A>上的屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>動詞命令， `false`，使用者將會防止和關閉該區域內的任何控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, disabled verbs are rendered in verbs menus with a visual cue such as a lighter text color.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，已停用的動詞命令會呈現在動詞命令功能表有視覺提示，例如較淡的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A> property in a derived class inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Enabled%2A>屬性繼承自衍生類別中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>。

trans-unit.target: 此來源的程式碼將示範只有自訂區域的程式碼部分而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>覆寫屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的程式碼的其餘部分可以找到的範例 > 一節中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string containing a unique ID for a verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含動詞命令唯一 ID 的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the ID for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ID property must be specified as a parameter when calling any of the overloads of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.%23ctor%2A> constructor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class.
trans-unit.target: ID 屬性的值必須指定為參數呼叫任何的多載時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.%23ctor%2A>建構函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string containing a URL to an image that represents a verb in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，包含在使用者介面 (UI) 中表示動詞命令之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the URL to an image.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property provides a way to use a customized visual representation for verbs as an alternative to the default rendering, which is typically a button or a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>屬性提供一個方式來使用自訂的視覺表示法指令動詞，或者為預設呈現，通常是一個按鈕或超連結。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a URL to the property, the image appears in verbs menus (next to the verb) or directly in forms (in place of a button or hyperlink that represents the verb).
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 URL 指派給屬性，則影像會出現 （下一步為動詞） 的動詞命令功能表中，或直接在表單上 （取代按鈕或超連結表示動詞命令）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property in a derived class inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>屬性繼承自衍生類別中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>。

trans-unit.target: 此來源的程式碼將示範只有自訂區域的程式碼部分而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>覆寫屬性的類別。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的程式碼的其餘部分可以找到的範例 > 一節中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Note that the sample code assigns a fictitious icon to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property; if you assign a real image or icon, it will appear next to the verb in the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 請注意的範例程式碼會指派一個虛構圖示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>屬性; 如果您指定實際影像或圖示，它就會顯示的動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令旁邊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether view state is currently being tracked for a verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前是否正在追蹤動詞命令的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if view state is being tracked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在追蹤檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the view state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含所要還原的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視狀態資訊從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的上一個網頁要求還原。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether there is any existing `savedState` from a previous page request, and if so, restores it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷是否有任何現有`savedState`來自先前頁面要求，如果是的話，將它還原。

trans-unit.source: Included in the process of restoring view state is the verb's visibility, which is determined by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 包含正在還原檢視狀態是動詞命令的可見性，是由值決定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Saves a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object's view-state changes that occurred since the page was last posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自從網頁上次回傳至伺服器以來所發生的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含所要儲存的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: If there is any view-state data, this method calls the base method and saves the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何檢視狀態資料，這個方法會呼叫基底方法，並將資料儲存。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the method that handles server-side click events for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得方法的參考，這個方法會處理動詞命令的伺服器端按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" /> that handles server-side click events.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler" />，處理伺服器端按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get a reference to the method that handles the server-side click events for a verb.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來取得方法的參考處理伺服器端按一下動詞命令的事件。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState" /> property by calling the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class's own <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.IsTrackingViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState" /> 類別自己的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 屬性，實作 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.IsTrackingViewState" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if view state is being tracked for a verb; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在追蹤動詞命令的檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class.
trans-unit.target: 方法只會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the view state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含所要還原的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IStateManager" /> interface by calling the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class's own <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.LoadViewState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class.
trans-unit.target: 方法只會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.LoadViewState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState" /> method by calling the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> class's own <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState" /> 類別自己的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 方法，實作 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> containing the control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控制項目前的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class.
trans-unit.target: 方法只會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.SaveViewState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別。

trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState" /> 類別自己的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 方法，實作 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.TrackViewState" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text label for a verb that is displayed in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者介面 (UI) 所顯示指定之動詞命令的文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the text label for a verb.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含動詞命令的文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the text of the label for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object; it is what represents the verb to users in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定標籤的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件; 它是什麼代表的動詞在 UI 中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: If developers (optionally) assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property, an image or icon represents the verb in the UI, and in certain cases (such as when the verb is normally rendered by a button or hyperlink) the image appears instead of the text label.
trans-unit.target: 如果開發人員 （選擇性） 指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>屬性、 影像或圖示代表在 UI 中，動詞命令，且在某些情況下 （例如，當動詞命令通常會轉譯按鈕或超連結） 影像出現而不是文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A> property in a derived class inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A>屬性繼承自衍生類別中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>。

trans-unit.source: This source code shows only the portion of the code for the custom zone and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class that overrides the property.
trans-unit.target: 此來源的程式碼將示範只有自訂區域的程式碼部分而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>覆寫屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the code required to run the example can be found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的程式碼的其餘部分可以找到的範例 > 一節中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, note that the value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A> property in the source code appears in the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請注意此值指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Text%2A>的原始程式碼中的屬性會出現在動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to a verb so the changes can be stored in the verb's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤動詞命令的檢視狀態變更，讓變更能夠儲存在動詞命令的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This method enables view state to be tracked for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會啟用檢視狀態來追蹤其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同網頁的多個要求之間，儲存和還原伺服器控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> that contains the server control's view-state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 的執行個體，包含伺服器控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object does not inherit from any class that tracks view state, and yet it has a number of properties that require view state to be tracked across multiple requests for the page, it implements its own property to maintain view state.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件沒有繼承任何類別，追蹤檢視狀態，而且尚未有需要跨多個頁面要求要追蹤的檢視狀態的屬性數目，它會實作自己的屬性，來維持檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a verb is visible to users.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出動詞命令對使用者是否可見。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the verb is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果動詞命令是可見，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Verbs often need to be hidden or displayed depending on the content of a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏或顯示根據 Web 組件的應用程式的內容通常需要動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, the minimize verb is hidden when a control is already minimized, and conversely, the restore verb is hidden when the control is in its normal, non-minimized state.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，當控制項已經降到最低，而且相反地，當控制項處於標準模式、 非最小化狀態會隱藏起來還原動詞命令時，會隱藏的最小化動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: A verb whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A> property is set to `false` is hidden from users, but is still rendered on a page, can still be accessed programmatically, and still fully participates in page and control life cycle events.
trans-unit.target: 動詞其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`false`看不見使用者，但仍然會轉譯頁面上，仍可存取以程式設計的方式，並仍然完整參與網頁和控制項的生命週期事件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。
